pages.speaker: npc
lines: Oh hey! That... That's a shard!

action: q.dialogue.set_page('page2');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Oh, man, you've got to trade that to me! I'll give you something good!

action: q.dialogue.set_page('page4');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: What do you want to trade?

q.dialogue.set_page('tradeblue');
q.dialogue.set_page('tradegreen');
q.dialogue.set_page('leave');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: You want to trade your Red Shard for my Fire Stone, right?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s[nbt={Inventory:[{id:"mega_showdown:fire_tera_shard"}]}] add ShardHave');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run clear @s[tag=ShardHave] mega_showdown:fire_tera_shard 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run give @s[tag=ShardHave] cobblemon:fire_stone 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound minecraft:itemget ambient @s[tag=ShardHave] ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run tag @s remove ShardHave');
q.dialogue.set_page('tradeend');
q.dialogue.set_page('page4');
